title: Number Slayers
description: An epic multi player online math game built with Three.js featuring immersive 3D graphics and engaging gameplay mechanics designed to make learning math fun and interactive.

title: Pong Multiverse Alpaca Squadron
description: This is one of the first things I built with JavaScript over 6 years ago. It took me months to get it working but I'm still proud of it!

title: TimelyCare
description: A comprehensive telehealth platform providing mental health and medical services to university students across the nation, built with accessibility as a core priority.
